name: SportsheadlinesfromTheLimaNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to daily sports updates from The Lima News, whether it's Buckeyes football, Locos baseball or high school sports. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
